text: Estadio Olímpico de Tapachula is a multi-purpose stadium in Tapachula, Chiapas, Mexico. It is currently used mostly for football matches and is the home stadium of Cafetaleros de Chiapas Premier. The stadium seats 22,000 people. In 2015 the stadium was renovated in order to house Tapachula's Ascenso MX franchise, Cafetaleros de Tapachula. In 2017 the stadium expanded to 22,000, adding 11,000 more seats from its 2015 renovation. ==References== Tapachula Category:Sports venues in Chiapas
title: Estadio Olímpico de Tapachula
